TITLE: Open Access Deposit Service
FILE_UPLOADER: Upload the accepted versions of your articles for publication below.
DRAG_DROP_FILES: or drag and drop files here to upload
FILE_LIMIT: All file formats are allowed, up to 500 MB.
UPLOAD_SUCCESS: Thank you! We have successfully received your files! The UdeM library team will contact you when your articles are published in open access!
ABOUT_PLUS: Easily deposit your articles in open access in Papyrus. Share your work with the UdeM community and contribute to the dissemination of knowledge.
LOGIN_DESCRIPTION:
Want to submit your article in open access to Papyrus? It's easy!
First, log in with your UdeM credentials, then submit your articles to us!
404_DESCRIPTION:
Sorry, the page you are looking for is not available.
Please check the address or return to the homepage to explore more.
MAINTENANCE_DESCRIPTION:
We are currently performing maintenance to improve your experience.
Thank you for your patience; the site will be back soon.
If you have urgent questions, please contact our support at support@exemple.com.
